parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host on which you want to query all public keys of the user.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.\
Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

> We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host on which you want to query all public keys of the user.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose public keys you want to query.
